lead_paragraph: As recent immigrants find their way on the streets, their lives are often hidden to the people walking past.

headline.main: JR Brings New York’s Immigrants Out of the Shadows

snippet: As recent immigrants find their way on the streets, their lives are often hidden to the people walking past.
abstract: Jaime Lowe interviews with more than a dozen recent immigrants living in New York City, who were photographed by French artist JR.
